title: Impact of good's price on MRP of labor

content.question: If the price of a good produced by a competitive firm increases, then

choices.label: the marginal product of labor will increase
the average product of labor will increase
the marginal revenue product of labor will increase
the short-run demand for labor will decrease
the supply of labor will increase

content.answer: the marginal revenue product of labor will increase

topic.text: 5.2: Changes in Factor Demand and Factor Supply

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
